tasks.task: Setting up and operating a linear irrigation system.
subtasks: Determining the applicability of linear irrigation for specific fields.
Comparing linear irrigation to center pivot systems in terms of efficiency and labor requirements.
Discussing the longevity and maintenance of linear irrigation hoses.
Examining water usage and crop compatibility for linear irrigation systems.
Demonstrating the labor-intensive aspects of maintaining a linear irrigation system.
Explaining the use of furrows in conjunction with linear irrigation systems.
Discussing the role of GPS technology in modern linear irrigation systems.
